{"id":473405602,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1616926636,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/473405602/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Unsorted Continuous Subarray","memory":"27.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findUnsortedSubarray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<int>sorted=nums;\n        sort(sorted.begin(),sorted.end());\n        int maxi=0;\n        int mini=2*nums.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++)\n        {\n            if(sorted[i]!=nums[i])\n            {\n                maxi=max(maxi,i);\n                mini=min(mini,i);\n            }\n                \n        }\n        if(maxi-mini==-2*nums.size())\n            return 0;\n        else\n            return maxi-mini+1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-unsorted-continuous-subarray"}
